page.title: 18MARLBOROUGH LOOKS OUTWARDS 1
page.content:
{BRITAIN IN BLOOM COMPETITION Marlborough entered this for the first time this year and we are hopeful of winning a commendation. We have started a similar 'Marlborough in Bloom' competition.
{VISIT TO GUNJUR The mayor will lead a party of 12 school children (4 from the College and 8 from St. John's comprehensive) to Gunjur, in the Gambia: a village that desperately needs our help in building a new classroom block. The money has been raised and the block will be built in what should be an exciting expedition. Next year it is hoped that people from Gunjur will visit to build a children's playground.
